error.title: Multiple Parents: Group had Multiple Parents
error.user_message: The Group you have selected to delete is owned by multiple Groups. You must first remove these groups, before deleting this group.

error.title: Insufficient Group Privilidges
error.user_message: You have insufficent group privilidges to access this system.

error.title: Group not found Exception
error.user_message: The specified Group is not a valid group. Or does not have sufficent access. Please contact your System Administrator.

error.title: Null Group Exception
error.user_message: This group is Null. Please contact your System Administrator.

error.title: Invalid Lattice Structure Exception
error.user_message: You may not delete the link between Group and Public. If you wish to remove this node, please remove by Deletion.
